mapper.select:
SELECT bno, title, content, writer, regdate
FROM notice ORDER BY bno desc, regdate desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice ( bno, title, content, writer, regdate, fname ) VALUES ( null, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, now(), #{fname} )
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, writer = #{writer}, regdate = now() WHERE bno = #{bno}
